content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services today?
Congratulations! You've won a free trip! Call now to claim!
I'm here to assist with your home service needs. If you have any plumbing, electrical, or HVAC requests, please let me know.
This is not a service call. Buy our product now! Limited offer!

This number appears to be sending unsolicited messages unrelated to our services. I will mark this conversation as spam and end it. If you need legitimate home services, feel free to contact us directly.
